ReportSection.title: Confirmation of University Responsibilities – Article A2.01.2

ReportItemSet.Static: A2.01.2 The responsibilities of an Academic Faculty member shall include Teaching, Research and Service as described below. [see remainder of Article A2] The proportion of Teaching, Research and Service shall be determined by agreement of the Department Chair and Academic Faculty member for the upcoming academic year, or as set out in the Academic Faculty member’s Letter of Appointment.
